channel.title: Themotion on Cesarob's
channel.description: Recent content in Themotion on Cesarob's

item.title: TheMotion, una retrospectiva
item.description: Ya en el 2016 escribí sobre mi entrada en TheMotion, tal y como puse ahí ha sido un ‘career inflection point’. De mi linked-in: I have already a broad career filling different positions being in the Technical Lead role for several years already. I like it as it allows you to be in a position between tech and product and also in direct relationship with processes. It is not easy that the What, Who and How get aligned and it is something that has happened in TheMotion.
